original_text: Then they would give the money that was weighed out into the hands of the workmen who had the oversight of the house of the Lord. And they paid it out to the carpenters and the builders who worked on the house of the Lord,
korean_text: 그 달아본 은을 일하는 자 곧 여호와의 성전을 맡은 자의 손에 넘기면 그들은 또 여호와의 성전을 수리하는 목수와 건축하는 자들에게 주고

sentences.original_text: Then they would give the money
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 그들은 그 돈을 주곤 했고

sentences.original_text: into the hands of the workmen
who had the oversight of the house of the Lord
to the carpenters and the builders
who worked on the house of the Lord
